name: Dynamics Task Creator Agent (Mock DB)
description: Creates a task record in the mock Dynamics database.

authSchemes.description: No authentication required for this agent.

skills.name: Create Dynamics Task
skills.description: Creates a task record in the mock_tasks table.

account_id.description: The Account ID the task relates to.

task_subject.description: The subject or description of the task.

related_record_id.description: Optional ID of a related record (e.g., Opportunity ID, Case ID).

success.description: Indicates if the task creation was successful.

created_task_id.description: The ID of the newly created task, or null if creation failed.
